unittitle_ssm: Harry Schwartz Papers
abstract_ssm: This collection contains materials related to the professional career of urban planner Harry Schwartz, including projects in and outside of New York City, addressing housing issues, traffic, the environment, and the elderly.  Also included are teaching materials and syllabi from graduate courses Schwartz taught on urban planning, and materials related to his involvement in civic activities promoting economic equality and historic preservation.
geogname_ssm: Cathedral of St. John the Divine (New York, N.Y.)
